features.name: Relentless Endurance
features.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead.

features.name: Savage Attacks
features.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee damage attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.
features.usage: Any time the condition is met

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
features.usage: Any time the condition is met
